definition: to dive/to go under water/(in an online forum) to lurk
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: qian2 shui3 zhuang1 bei4 tuo1 lun2 xiang1

sentences.english: His diving expeditions, which often involved extensive hours at sea, covered some 30 sites in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 他长时间在海中考察，潜水点更多达三十多处。

sentences.english: I asked to get buddied up with an experienced diver .
sentences.chinese: 我要求和有经验的潜水员搭档。

sentences.english: The Caribbean waters there are also perfect for scuba diving.
sentences.chinese: 那里的加勒比海域也非常适合进行斯库巴潜水。

sentences.english: As the report states, "Among these were five solo divers who could not get help."
sentences.chinese: 根据报告陈述，其中有5个独自潜水者无法获取帮助。

sentences.english: He goes scuba-diving at Kenting every summer.
sentences.chinese: 他每年暑假都到垦丁去潜水。

sentences.english: A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一位潜水者探险铁丝珊瑚在日本的Suruga湾。

sentences.english: The one activity Palau is most famous for among adventurous travelers is diving.
sentences.chinese: 对喜爱冒险的游客来说，帛琉最出名的活动就是潜水。

sentences.english: Sean had already made three dives earlier in the day on that sameexact spot.
sentences.chinese: 在那一天，同一个潜水地点，西恩已经潜过三次了。

sentences.english: The two tried to share air, but panic took hold of the out-of-air diver.
sentences.chinese: 两个人分享氧气，但是惊慌毁掉了缺氧潜水者。

sentences.english: The next day I bought a pair of swim fins and I have been skin diving ever since.
sentences.chinese: 我第二天买了一橡皮脚蹼，自此从事切肤潜水。

sentences.english: Is there any more diving into the deep rock-pool below the Bee-Rocks, Little Brother?
sentences.chinese: 你还能在蜜蜂岩下的石头池塘里潜水吗，小兄弟？

sentences.english: More recently, breath-hold diving has become a competitive sport.
sentences.chinese: 最近，屏息潜水已经成为一种竞技运动。

sentences.english: A mini-submarine was called in to help the search for bodies, along with divers.
sentences.chinese: 一艘微型潜艇被征召，以配合潜水员搜索尸体。

sentences.english: The best place for diving is the West Islet and the Wuzhizhou Islet in Sanya.
sentences.chinese: 潜水的最佳去处是三亚的西岛和蜈支洲岛。
